name: forge-boiler.nodejs
description: Forge boiler: viewer + server + data-management + derivatives

NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION.description: This forces Heroku to install devDependencies, needed to build the App. Must be false!

FORGE_CLIENT_ID.description: Your Forge Client ID API Key

FORGE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your Forge Client Secret API Key

HOST_URL.description: Host url: for Heroku App use 'https://myApp.herokuapp.com', where 'myApp' is name of your app. Important: the name of your App needs to match the callback URL you specified on Forge Developer Portal
